alert.note: Alert for Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 8:18PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Mower County through 900 PM CDT... At 818 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Blooming Prairie, or 7 miles north of Austin, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brownsdale around 830 PM CDT. Grand Meadow around 850 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sargeant, Mapleview, Lansing, Brookside Campground, Mayville, Elkton, Waltham, and Reonva. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 176 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
